prompt.content: Using Uber Technologies’ (NYSE: UBER) Q1–Q4 2024 earnings releases, determine whether Uber’s 2024 quarterly Adjusted EBITDA results beat or missed management’s midpoint guidance. Express each quarter as “Q[X] 2024: BEAT (X.X%)” or “MISS (X.X%).” Use guidance provided in each prior quarter’s release. Round to 2 decimals.

rubrics.name: Use Q4 2023 earnings press release to find Q1 2024 EBITDA guidance range to be 1.26-1.34B.

messages.content: Use Q4 2023 earnings press release to find Q1 2024 EBITDA guidance range to be 1.26-1.34B.

rubrics.name: Identify Q1 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to be (1.26 + 1.34) / 2 = $1.30B

messages.content: Identify Q1 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to be (1.26 + 1.34) / 2 = $1.30B

rubrics.name: Look in Q1 2024 Earnings report and find that Q1 2024 actual adjusted EBITDA is $1382M

messages.content: Look in Q1 2024 Earnings report and find that Q1 2024 actual adjusted EBITDA is $1382M

rubrics.name: Compare Q1 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to the actual adjusted EBITDA and conclude that Uber BEAT guidance by 1,382−1,300)/1,300 = 6.31%: Q1 2024: BEAT (6.31%)

messages.content: Compare Q1 2024 midpoint EBITDA guidance to the actual adjusted EBITDA and conclude that Uber BEAT guidance by 1,382−1,300)/1,300 = 6.31%: Q1 2024: BEAT (6.31%)
